info.title: Setu Insights
info.description: Setuâ€™s Insights API gives you actionable insights from a customer's bank statement about their income, expenditure and financial history.

get.description: Call this API to get a list of FI Datablocks created by the FIU

post.description: Call this API with the data received from FIP's notification as payload, to create an FI DataBlock. Note: This data can be auto-fetched from FIP with FIU's consent in the future.

schema.title: FI Data as defined by ReBIT schema

get.description: Call this API with the report-id to get the created Insights

schema.title: Report ID for which insights are needed
Response 200 Get Insights V1 Insight Get

post.description: Call this API with the template-id received from Setu along with a list of data-ids, to trigger an Report generation job. The FI Datablocks can belong to multiple bank accounts.The created Report will be shared via a notification to the endpoint configured by the FIU.This API will respond with a report-id, which can also be used to fetch the generated Report.

value.errorMsg: Unable to find FIData with id: 4e8e6d50-2dd4-43d0-a79a-5348b935ecf4

post.description: Call this API with the template-id received from Setu along with a PDF File, to trigger an Report generation job. The created Report will be shared via a notification to the endpoint configured by the FIU. This API will respond with a report-id, which can also be used to fetch the generated Report.

value.errorMsg: Unable to find FIData with id: 4e8e6d50-2dd4-43d0-a79a-5348b935ecf4

get.summary: Get Supported Banks for PDF Parsing
get.description: Call this API to get a list of Supported Banks for PDF Parsing.

templateId.title: Template ID for which insights are needed

dataIds.title: List of data blocks to process

template_id.title: Template ID for which insights are needed

bankName.title: Name of Bank of associated PDF
bankName.description: Bank name is case sensitive and should be in list pf supported banks. Supported banks can be fetched from /pdf/supported_banks

applicantName.title: Name of Account Holder in associated PDF
applicantName.description: Can be any place holder string, But it is suggested to provide unique applicant name, to trace references in future in case of repeated usage

password.title: Password for reading associated PDF
password.description: The field is Optional, but if the PDF document is password protected, then password should be provided for reading the file.
